ModerateEntityTags.pageDescription: Manage tags used to classify and categorize documents. These tags help users organize and find content more effectively. Tags are append-only and cannot be deleted once created.
ModerateEntityTags.sectionDescription: Tags that can be applied to documents for categorization

ModerateReferenceTags.pageDescription: Manage semantic relationship types between documents. These tags define how documents can reference and relate to each other. Tags are append-only and cannot be deleted once created.
ModerateReferenceTags.sectionDescription: Semantic relationships that can connect documents

ModerateRecent.pageDescription: Monitor recent document submissions and modifications across the platform.
ModerateRecent.sectionDescription: View and review recently added or modified documents
ModerateRecent.activityWillAppear: Document activity will appear here as users submit new content

CookieBanner.gdprDescription: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide, protect, and improve our services. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies as described in our Cookie Policy. You can change your preferences at any time.
CookieBanner.gdprLearnMore: Learn more about our data processing in our Privacy Policy.
CookieBanner.ccpaDescription: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. California residents have the right to opt out of the sale of personal information.
CookieBanner.ccpaLearnMore: See our Privacy Policy for details about your California privacy rights.
CookieBanner.generalDescription: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts.
CookieBanner.generalLearnMore: See our Privacy Policy for more information.

CookiePreferences.title: Cookie Preferences
CookiePreferences.description: Manage your cookie preferences and privacy settings. Changes will take effect immediately.
CookiePreferences.dataManagementDescription: Export includes all cookies, local storage, and session data. Delete will remove all data and reload the page.
CookiePreferences.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all your data including cookies, preferences, and session information. This action cannot be undone and will reload the page.

About.tagline: The open-source, future-proof framework that enables humans and intelligent agents to co-create shared knowledge ‚Äî governed by you and built to last.
About.missionDescription: Semiont is building the foundation for a new era of knowledge management where human creativity and artificial intelligence work together seamlessly. We believe that the future of information belongs to everyone, not just a few large corporations. Our platform ensures that your knowledge remains yours while enabling powerful collaborative capabilities.
About.semanticContentSubtitle: Entity recognition, knowledge graphs, and semantic relationships
About.semanticContentPara1: Our semantic content engine goes beyond simple text storage. It understands the meaning and relationships within your documents, automatically identifying entities like people, places, concepts, and events.
About.semanticContentPara2: By building knowledge graphs from your content, Semiont creates a rich, interconnected web of information that enables powerful queries, intelligent suggestions, and deep insights that would be impossible with traditional document management systems.
About.collaborationSubtitle: Live editing, AI-assisted workflows, conflict resolution, and team coordination
About.collaborationPara1: Work together with your team and AI assistants in real-time. See changes as they happen, with intelligent conflict resolution that understands context and intent, not just text differences.
About.collaborationPara2: Our AI-assisted workflows help automate routine tasks, suggest improvements, and maintain consistency across your knowledge base. The platform learns from your team's patterns and preferences, becoming more helpful over time while respecting your creative control.
About.rbacSubtitle: Fine-grained permissions, asset-level control, and audit trails
About.rbacPara1: Take complete control over who can access, modify, and share your knowledge. Our role-based access control system provides granular permissions down to individual documents, sections, or even specific data points.
About.rbacPara2: Every action is logged in immutable audit trails, ensuring complete transparency and compliance. Define custom roles that match your organization's structure, with dynamic permissions that can adapt based on context, time, or workflow state.
About.openSourceDescription: Semiont is proudly open source. We believe that the tools for managing humanity's knowledge should be transparent, auditable, and owned by everyone. Join our community of developers, researchers, and knowledge workers building the future together.
About.futureVisionDescription: We're just getting started. Semiont is evolving into a comprehensive platform for knowledge creation, curation, and collaboration. Stay tuned as we roll out new features and capabilities that will transform how you work with information.

Privacy.introPara1: Semiont is an AI-Powered Research Environment designed to facilitate collaborative knowledge work and analysis. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal information transparently and securely.
Privacy.introPara2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
Privacy.personalInfoItem1: Email address and name (when you sign in with Google OAuth)
Privacy.personalInfoItem3: Research data and content you create or upload
Privacy.howWeUseItem1: Provide and maintain our research platform services
Privacy.howWeUseItem3: Improve platform performance and user experience
Privacy.howWeUseItem4: Communicate important updates and security notices
Privacy.cookiePolicyIntro: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content.
Privacy.necessaryCookiesDesc: Essential for website functionality, including authentication and security features.
Privacy.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve user experience.
Privacy.marketingCookiesDesc: Used to track visitors across websites for relevant advertising and campaign measurement.
Privacy.preferenceCookiesDesc: Remember your choices and preferences for a personalized experience.
Privacy.gdprRight1: Right to access your personal data
Privacy.gdprRight2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Privacy.gdprRight3: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
Privacy.ccpaRight1: Right to know what personal information is collected
Privacy.ccpaRight3: Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information
Privacy.ccpaRight4: Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights
Privacy.dataSecurityIntro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:
Privacy.dataSecurityItem1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We retain personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Research data is retained according to your account settings and applicable data retention policies.
Privacy.internationalTransfersDesc: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers in compliance with applicable privacy laws.
Privacy.contactIntro: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us at:
Privacy.updatesPara1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date.

Terms.pageSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Semiont
Terms.aupIntro: By using Semiont, you agree to use our platform responsibly and in accordance with these terms. We are committed to maintaining a safe, respectful, and productive environment for all users.
Terms.prohibitedIntro: You may not upload, share, or create content that includes:
Terms.prohibitedIllegal: Illegal Content: Any content that violates local, state, national, or international laws
Terms.prohibitedMinors: Harmful to Minors: Content depicting, encouraging, or promoting harm to children or minors
Terms.prohibitedAdult: Adult Content: Pornographic, sexually explicit, or adult content of any kind
Terms.prohibitedViolence: Violence and Abuse: Content depicting, promoting, or encouraging violence, abuse, harassment, or harm to individuals or groups
Terms.prohibitedHate: Hate Speech: Content that promotes hatred, discrimination, or violence based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, disability, or other protected characteristics
Terms.prohibitedMisinfo: Misinformation: Deliberately false or misleading information, especially content that could cause harm
Terms.prohibitedPrivacy: Privacy Violations: Personal information of others without consent, including doxxing or sharing private communications
Terms.prohibitedIP: Intellectual Property Violations: Copyrighted material, trademarks, or other intellectual property without proper authorization
Terms.prohibitedMalicious: Malicious Content: Malware, viruses, phishing attempts, or other security threats
Terms.prohibitedSpam: Spam and Manipulation: Unsolicited bulk content, manipulation of platform features, or automated abuse
Terms.aiAllianceIntro: Semiont is committed to the principles outlined in the
Terms.aiAlliance1: Promoting responsible AI development and deployment
Terms.aiAlliance2: Ensuring transparency and accountability in AI systems
Terms.aiAlliance3: Respecting privacy, security, and human rights
Terms.aiAlliance4: Fostering inclusive and diverse participation in AI advancement
Terms.aiAlliance5: Encouraging ethical considerations in all AI-related activities
Terms.responsibilitiesIntro: As a user of Semiont, you agree to:
Terms.responsibility1: Use the platform only for lawful and constructive purposes
Terms.responsibility2: Respect the rights and dignity of other users
Terms.responsibility3: Report any violations of these terms that you encounter
Terms.responsibility4: Keep your account secure and not share access credentials
Terms.responsibility5: Provide accurate information during registration and use
Terms.responsibility6: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Terms.moderationText: We reserve the right to review, moderate, and remove content that violates these terms. We may also suspend or terminate accounts that repeatedly violate our policies. Content moderation decisions will be made in accordance with these terms and applicable law.
Terms.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our
Terms.privacyEnd: to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
Terms.ipText: Users retain ownership of their original content while granting Semiont necessary rights to provide our services. All platform technology, including AI models and algorithms, remain the property of Semiont and its licensors.
Terms.liabilityText: Semiont is provided "as is" without warranties. We strive to provide reliable service but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access or error-free operation. Users are responsible for their own content and activities on the platform.
Terms.changesText: We may update these terms periodically. Users will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
Terms.contactText: If you have questions about these terms or need to report violations, please contact our support team through the platform or at the contact information provided in our Privacy Policy.
